DOC.brief_summary: Phase I clinical study compare pharmacokinetic profile bactericidal activity Zabofloxacin 183mg , 367mg Levofloxacin 250mg oral administration healthy volunteer
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Pharmacokinetics Profiles Bactericidal Activity Zabofloxacin
DOC.detailed_description: A Randomized , open label , single dose , crossover phase I clinical study compare pharmacokinetic profile bactericidal activity Zabofloxacin 183mg , 367mg Levofloxacin 250mg oral administration healthy volunteer
